##### FILE: deployment4877.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app3-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app3-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app3
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: app3
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        name: app3
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: app3-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /vagrant/app3
        name: app3-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource default/Deployment/app3-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: deployment4896.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/custom-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: custom-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: my-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: my-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: custom-nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /prodapplication2
          name: myebsvolume2
      volumes:
      - name: myebsvolume2
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: myebsvol-pv-claim2

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo 'Hello from BusyBox!'; sleep 10; done
        image: busybox
        name: myapp-container
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: special
        operator: Equal
        value: "true"

##### FILE: deployment4904.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.9.5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

        - /data/db

          value: admin
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mongo
        name: mongo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbname
              name: database-secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: database-secret-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: database-secret-config
        image: deekshithsn/go-url-shortener:1.0
        name: go-url-shortener
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

kind: Deployment

  name: my-auto-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-auto-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-auto-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do timeout 0.5s yes >/dev/null; sleep 0.5s; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ubuntu-slim:0.1
        name: my-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: application-cpu
  name: application-cpu
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: application-cpu
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: application-cpu
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/application-cpu:v1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: application-cpu
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 500Mi

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 50Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    k8s-app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config-reloader-image=quay.io/coreos/configmap-reload:v0.0.1
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/coreos/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.33.0
        image: quay.io/coreos/prometheus-operator:v0.33.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

##### FILE: deployment4918.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:8443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8081/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https-main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:9443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8082/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-self
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https-self
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --host=127.0.0.1
        - --port=8081
        - --telemetry-host=127.0.0.1
        - --telemetry-port=8082
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        name: kube-state-metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.34.0

            memory: 100Mi

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.40.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.40.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config-reloader-image=jimmidyson/configmap-reload:v0.3.0
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/coreos/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.40.0
        image: quay.io/coreos/prometheus-operator:v0.40.0
        name: prometheus-operator

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        - --secure-listen-address=:8443

        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8080/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https

          runAsUser: 65534

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
      volumes:
      - name: www
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mypvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webdeploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: webdeploy
  name: webdeploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      server: web
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        server: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd:2.4
        name: webserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment4926.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mydeployment
  name: mydeployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      server: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        server: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginxcontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      - args:
        - sleep 300
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu
        name: server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webdeploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: webdeploy
  name: webdeploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      server: web
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        server: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd:2.4
        name: webserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/syscont-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: syscont
  name: syscont-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:

        io.kubernetes.cri-o.userns-mode: auto:size=65536
      labels:
        app: syscont
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /sbin/init
        image: registry.nestybox.com/nestybox/ubuntu-bionic-systemd-docker
        name: ubu-bio-systemd-docker
      runtimeClassName: sysbox-runc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgre:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgre
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgre
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: postgre
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: pq123
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:15.0
        name: postgre
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-vol
          subPath: pgdata
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /k3d/images
          type: Directory
        name: db-vol

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/bittorrent:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    keel.sh/policy: all
    keel.sh/pollSchedule: '@hourly'
    keel.sh/trigger: poll
  name: bittorrent
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bittorrent
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: bittorrent
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Los_Angeles
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/wireguard:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - wg show | grep -q transfer
        name: wireguard
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/wireguard/
          name: wireguard-config
        - mountPath: /lib/modules
          name: lib-modules
          readOnly: true
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1000"
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Los_Angeles
        - name: USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: USER
              name: transmission-secrets
        - name: PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PASS
              name: transmission-secrets
        - name: PEERPORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PEERPORT
              name: transmission-secrets
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/transmission:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8000
        name: transmission
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9091
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: transmission-config
        - mountPath: /downloads
          name: downloads
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: bittorrent-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /config/keys
          name: ssl-certs
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: nginx-logs
      - env:
        - name: USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: USER
              name: transmission-secrets
        - name: PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PASS
              name: transmission-secrets
        image: 10.0.0.238:31320/transmission-liveness-server
        name: transmission-liveness-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: obsidiana
      securityContext:
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.conf.all.src_valid_mark
          value: "1"
        - name: net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding
          value: "1"
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/bittorrent/transmission/config
        name: transmission-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/bittorrent/airvpn
        name: wireguard-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/modules
        name: lib-modules
      - hostPath:
          path: /downloads
        name: downloads
      - configMap:
          name: bittorrent-nginx-configmap
        name: nginx-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/bittorrent/nginx/keys
        name: ssl-certs
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/bittorrent/nginx/log
        name: nginx-logs

          readOnly: false
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 0

        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-grafana
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/env-injector-webhook-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: env-injector
  name: env-injector-webhook-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: env-injector
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: env-injector
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -envCfgFile=/etc/webhook/config/envconfig.yaml
        - -tlsCertFile=/etc/webhook/certs/cert.pem
        - -tlsKeyFile=/etc/webhook/certs/key.pem
        - -alsologtostderr
        - -v=4
        - 2>&1
        image: hmctspublic.azurecr.io/hmcts/k8s-env-injector:492855_20231212
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: env-injector
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/webhook/certs
          name: webhook-certs
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/webhook/config
          name: webhook-config
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-certs
        secret:
          secretName: env-injector-webhook-certs
      - configMap:
          name: env-injector-webhook-configmap
        name: webhook-config

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: monitoring

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secretKey
              name: mysql-root-password
        image: mysql:8.0.36
        name: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/mysql/conf.d/default_auth.cnf
          name: mysql-config-volume
          subPath: default_auth
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mysql-config
        name: mysql-config-volume
      - name: mysql-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: deployment4980.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-server
  name: prometheus-deployment
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        command:
        - /metrics-server
        - --kubelet-insecure-tls
        - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus/
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: prometheus-server-conf
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: prometheus-storage-volume

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    name: docker-bench
  name: docker-bench-security
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: docker-bench
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: docker-bench
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - sleep infinity
        image: madhuakula/hacker-container
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: docker-bench
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 80Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - AUDIT_CONTROL
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib
          name: var-lib-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/lib/systemd
          name: usr-lib-systemd-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc
          name: etc-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /lib/systemd/system
          name: lib-systemd-system-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/bin/containerd
          name: usr-bin-contained-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/bin/runc
          name: usr-bin-runc-vol
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/docker.sock
          name: docker-sock-volume
          readOnly: true
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      securityContext:
        runAsUser: 0
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib
        name: var-lib-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/lib/systemd
        name: usr-lib-systemd-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc
        name: etc-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/systemd/system
        name: lib-systemd-system-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/bin/containerd
        name: usr-bin-contained-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/bin/runc
        name: usr-bin-runc-vol
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/docker.sock
          type: Socket
        name: docker-sock-volume

##### FILE: deployment5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#00A36C'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment5002_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/system-monitor-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: system-monitor-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: system-monitor
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: system-monitor
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: K8S_GOAT_VAULT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: k8sgoatvaultkey
              name: goatvault
        image: madhuakula/k8s-goat-system-monitor
        name: system-monitor
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host-system
          name: host-filesystem
      hostIPC: true
      hostPID: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: host-filesystem

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to django/Deployment/django:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: django
  name: django
  namespace: django
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: django
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: django
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: django-secrets
        image: django-production-kustomize
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: django-production-kustomize
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /static
          name: staticfiles
      nodeSelector:
        role: django
      serviceAccountName: django
      volumes:
      - name: staticfiles
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: staticfiles-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to django/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: django
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.27.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: default.conf
        - mountPath: /static
          name: staticfiles
      nodeSelector:
        role: django
      serviceAccountName: django
      volumes:
      - name: staticfiles
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: staticfiles-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 7
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.25.4
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment5008.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.24.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: elasticsearch
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.13.2-arm64
        name: elasticsearch
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 4Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-storage
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc

##### FILE: deployment5014.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to grafana/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: grafana
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:9.3.6
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 472:472 /var/lib/grafana
        image: busybox
        name: fix-perms
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-config

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: homarr
  namespace: homarr
spec:
  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: homarr
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: homarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/ajnart/homarr:latest
        name: homarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7575
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/configs
          name: homarr-configs
        - mountPath: /app/public/icons
          name: homarr-icons
        - mountPath: /data
          name: homarr-data
      volumes:
      - name: homarr-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-data-pvc
      - name: homarr-configs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-config-pvc
      - name: homarr-icons
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: homarr-icons-pvc

##### FILE: deployment5016.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to homepage/Deployment/homepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
  name: homepage
  namespace: homepage
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/gethomepage/homepage:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: homepage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.js
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.js
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.css
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.css
        - mountPath: /app/config/bookmarks.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: bookmarks.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/docker.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: docker.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/kubernetes.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: kubernetes.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/services.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: services.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/settings.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: settings.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/widgets.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: widgets.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/logs
          name: logs
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      enableServiceLinks: true
      serviceAccountName: homepage
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: homepage
        name: homepage-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs

---

##### FILE: deployment5017.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/jenkins-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jenkins-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jenkins
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jenkins
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Djenkins.install.runSetupWizard=false
        image: jenkins/jenkins:lts
        name: jenkins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        - containerPort: 8090
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
          name: jenkins-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /var/jenkins_home
        image: busybox
        name: fix-perms
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
          name: jenkins-storage
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: jenkins-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jenkins-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: awx
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: awxpass
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: awx
        image: postgres:12
        name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

##### FILE: deployment5019.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to prometheus/Deployment/prometheus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prometheus
  namespace: prometheus
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prometheus
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        - --storage.tsdb.retention.time=15d
        - --storage.tsdb.retention.size=20GB
        image: prom/prometheus:v2.51.2
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus
          name: prometheus-storage
      volumes:
      - name: prometheus-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prometheus-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-config
        name: config-volume

---

      - env:

          value: default
        image: minikube-sample:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: minikube-sample
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:

          name: config
      volumes:

        name: config

##### FILE: deployment5021.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/traefik:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: traefik
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: traefik
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: traefik
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --api.dashboard=true
        - --providers.kubernetescrd
        - --entrypoints.web.address=:80
        - --log.filePath=/data/traefik.log
        - --accesslog.filePath=/data/access.log
        image: traefik:v3.0
        name: traefik
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        - containerPort: 443
          name: websecure
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: admin
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: traefik-data
      serviceAccountName: traefik-ingress-controller
      volumes:
      - name: traefik-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: traefik-nfs-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment5027.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: deployment503.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to application/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    run: nginx
    type: frontend
  name: myapp
  namespace: application
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
      run: nginx
      type: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 5
      maxUnavailable: 5
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        run: nginx
        type: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:perl
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource application/Deployment/myapp

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource application/Deployment/myapp
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource application/Deployment/myapp failed:
1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

kind: Pod

  name: jjtech-pod

    name: myapp
    ports:

      name: http

        memory: 500Mi

        memory: 200Mi

##### FILE: deployment5030.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wardle/Deployment/wardle-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    apiserver: "true"
  name: wardle-server
  namespace: wardle
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      apiserver: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        apiserver: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --etcd-servers=http://localhost:2379
        image: kube-sample-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: wardle-server
      - image: quay.io/coreos/etcd:v3.4.13
        name: etcd
      serviceAccountName: apiserver

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/custom-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deploy: frontend
  name: custom-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: custom-nginx
      tier: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: custom-nginx
        tier: frontend
      name: custom-nginx-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: prashun08/custom-nginx:v3-release
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

kind: Deployment

  name: my-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: data-volume
      volumes:
      - name: data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-pvc

##### FILE: deployment5040.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to tools/Deployment/kube-web-view:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    application: kube-web-view
  name: kube-web-view
  namespace: tools
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      application: kube-web-view
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        application: kube-web-view
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --port=8080
        - --show-container-logs
        image: hjacobs/kube-web-view:23.2.0
        name: kube-web-view
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: kube-web-view

---

##### FILE: deployment5047.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to hub/Deployment/notification-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: notification-service
  namespace: hub
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notification-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: notification-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: radito3/ss-notification-service:1.0.2
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /public/ping
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: notification-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/private-key
          name: private-key-volume
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: private-key-volume
        secret:
          secretName: creds-encryption-key

---

##### FILE: deployment506.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to application/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    run: nginx
    type: frontend
  name: myapp
  namespace: application
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
      run: nginx
      type: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        run: nginx
        type: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:perl
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment5061.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/release-name-traefik:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name-default
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
    helm.sh/chart: traefik-25.0.0
  name: release-name-traefik
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name-default
      app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9100"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name-default
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
        helm.sh/chart: traefik-25.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --global.checknewversion
        - --global.sendanonymoususage
        - --entrypoints.metrics.address=:9100/tcp
        - --entrypoints.traefik.address=:9000/tcp
        - --entrypoints.web.address=:80/tcp
        - --entrypoints.web.http.redirections.entryPoint.to=websecure
        - --entrypoints.websecure.address=:443/tcp
        - --api.dashboard=true
        - --ping=true
        - --metrics.prometheus=true
        - --metrics.prometheus.entrypoint=metrics
        - --providers.kubernetescrd
        - --providers.kubernetesingress
        - --entrypoints.websecure.http.tls=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: docker.io/traefik:v2.10.5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle: null
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 9000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: release-name-traefik
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: traefik
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: websecure
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 9000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources: null
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext:
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 65532
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65532
      serviceAccountName: release-name-traefik
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    group: example
  name: second-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: second-app
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: second-app
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: axel9309/kub-first-app:4
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: second-node

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/story-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: story-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: story
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: story
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: axel9309/kub-data-demo:2
        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: story-volume

  template:

        app: my-app

      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: data-volume
      volumes:
      - name: data-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-pvc

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: first-api
  name: first-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: first-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: first-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILE
          value: cloud
        - name: openai-api-key
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: openai-api-key
              name: first-api-secret
        - name: serp-api-key
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: serp-api-key
              name: first-api-secret
        image: dc2software/first-docker-repo:1.1.3
        name: first-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  annotations:
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-certificate-id: 5749f67f-e391-4cfc-9319-289c78c02b60
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-hostname: danielchemicz.com
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-protocol: http
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-redirect-http-to-https: "true"
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-tls-passthrough: "false"
    service.beta.kubernetes.io/do-loadbalancer-tls-ports: "443"
  name: first-api-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8080
  - name: https
    port: 443
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 8080
  selector:
    app: first-api
  type: LoadBalancer

---

##### FILE: deployment5079.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: nginx-api
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8180
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-api:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-api
      - args:
        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-api:v0.1.0
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8180
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/api
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          items:
          - key: api-config.yaml
            path: api-config.yaml
          secretName: api-config

---

##### FILE: deployment508.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    run: nginx
    type: frontend
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
      run: nginx
      type: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 5
      maxUnavailable: 5
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        run: nginx
        type: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:perl
        name: myapp
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment5080.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: ASSETS_DIR
          value: /var/www/assets
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8280
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-web:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/assets
          name: assets-volume
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - server
        - --api-address=http://api:80
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-web:v0.1.0
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8280
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp -r /go/src/github.com/gihyodocker/taskapp/assets/* /var/www/assets
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-web:v0.1.0
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/assets
          name: assets-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: assets-volume

---

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: kubernetes-docker-example
  template:

      labels:
        app: kubernetes-docker-example

      containers:
      - image: kubernetes-docker-example
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: kubernetes-docker-example
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hamster:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hamster
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hamster
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hamster
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do timeout 0.5s yes >/dev/null; sleep 0.5s; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: registry.k8s.io/ubuntu-slim:0.1
        name: hamster
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534

---

  replicas: 1

##### FILE: deployment5086.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

          name: liveness-port

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/logs-checker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: logs-checker
    domain: tools
  name: logs-checker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: logs-checker
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: logs-checker
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do kubectl logs -n $(NAMESPACE) -l $(LABEL) --since=1h > /home/data/log-$(date
          -u +'%!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING)T%!H(MISSING)-%!M(MISSING)-%!S(MISSING)Z'); sleep 3600; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: monitoring
        - name: LABEL
          value: app=grafana
        image: bygui86/kubectl:v1.29.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kubectl
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 32Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/data
          name: data
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        runAsGroup: 1001
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1001
      serviceAccountName: log-reader
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: logs-checker

---

          name: liveness-port

          periodSeconds: 10

kind: Deployment

  namespace: three-tier

    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

      app: grafana

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana

          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.14.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 250Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment512.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=service
        - --source=ingress
        - --provider=azure
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.14.0
        name: external-dns
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes
          name: azure-config-file
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: external-dns
      volumes:
      - name: azure-config-file
        secret:
          secretName: azure-config-file

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: realtime-chat-app
  name: realtime-chat-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: realtime-chat-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: realtime-chat-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_ID
              name: realtime-chat-app-secrets
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_KEY
              name: realtime-chat-app-secrets
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_SECRET
              name: realtime-chat-app-secrets
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_CLUSTER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: NEXT_PUBLIC_PUSHER_APP_CLUSTER
              name: realtime-chat-app-secrets
        image: jaraxxx/wsl_test:v1
        name: realtime-chat-app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
