    matchLabels:
      role: api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongodb-svc:27017/todo?directConnection=true
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: 375728455575.dkr.ecr.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/backend:3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3500
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ok
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ecr-registry-secret

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/event-generator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: event-generator
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: event-generator
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: event-generator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.10.0
    helm.sh/chart: event-generator-0.3.3
  name: event-generator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: event-generator
      app.kubernetes.io/name: event-generator
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: event-generator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: event-generator
        app.kubernetes.io/name: event-generator
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: event-generator
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/event-generator
        - run
        - ^syscall
        - --loop
        env:
        - name: FALCO_EVENT_GENERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: falcosecurity/event-generator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: event-generator
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: event-generator

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to falco/Deployment/falcosidekick:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: core
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: falcosidekick
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: falcosidekick
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: falcosidekick
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.28.0
    helm.sh/chart: falcosidekick-0.7.18
  name: falcosidekick
  namespace: falco
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: core
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: falcosidekick
      app.kubernetes.io/name: falcosidekick
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        checksum/config: d9feb707017274fc2eafc854098480926492d235b7cceab247d3c60e8346c729
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: core
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: falcosidekick
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: falcosidekick
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: falcosidekick
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.28.0
        helm.sh/chart: falcosidekick-0.7.18
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DEBUG
          value: "true"
        - name: CUSTOMFIELDS
          value: ""
        - name: TEMPLATEDFIELDS
          value: ""
        - name: BRACKETREPLACER
          value: ""
        - name: MUTUALTLSFILESPATH
          value: /etc/certs
        - name: MUTUALTLSCLIENT_CERTFILE
          value: ""
        - name: MUTUALTLSCLIENT_KEYFILE
          value: ""
        - name: MUTUALTLSCLIENT_CACERTFILE
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: falcosidekick
        image: docker.io/falcosecurity/falcosidekick:2.28.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: falcosidekick
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2801
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources: {}
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1234
        runAsUser: 1234
      serviceAccountName: falcosidekick

---

kind: Deployment

    matchLabels:
      app: jiralert

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jiralert
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/jiralert-config/jiralert.yml
        - --log.level=debug
        - --listen-address=:9097
        image: quay.io/app-sre/jiralert:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9097
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: jiralert
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9091
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 15
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9097
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 250Mi

        - mountPath: /jiralert-config
          name: jiralert-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: jiralert-config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        image: ivsonv/hello-go:v6
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 4
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc

(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

        - configMapRef:
            name: sas-ldap-config

          name: sas-ldap-ldifs

          name: sas-ldap-rfc2307bis

      restartPolicy: Always

        persistentVolumeClaim:

          secretName: sas-ldap-certs

          name: sas-ldap-ldifs

          value: "3002"
        - name: HTTP_PORT

kind: Deployment

    app: notifications
  name: notifications
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: notifications
  template:
    metadata:

        app: notifications
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: GOOGLE_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID
          value: 474561109502-01jd9hpvg9th7bvt776q2j5jvvdae8ni.apps.googleusercontent.com

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientSecret
              name: google
        - name: GOOGLE_OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: refreshToken
              name: google
        - name: SMTP_USER
          value: sleeprnestapp@gmail.com
        image: us-east4-docker.pkg.dev/sleepr-378423/notifications/production

        - containerPort: 3000

    app: clinic-system-react
  name: clinic-system-react-deploy
  namespace: clinic-system

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: clinic-system-react
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: clinic-system-react
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: clinic-system-react:0.0.3
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: clinic-system-react
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: deployment5194_2.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to clinic-system/Ingress/clinic-system-react-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  labels:
    name: clinic-system-react-ingress
  name: clinic-system-react-ingress
  namespace: clinic-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: react.clinic.system.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: clinic-system-react
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

          valueFrom:

              key: phx_host
              name: cluster-app-config-map

              key: headless_service_dns

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP

##### FILE: deployment5211.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-user
              name: grafana
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: grafana
        image: grafana/grafana:10.0.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          name: config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboardproviders.yaml
          name: dashboards
          subPath: dashboardproviders.yaml
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        runAsUser: 472
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana
        name: config
      - configMap:
          name: datasources
        name: datasources
      - configMap:
          name: dashboards
        name: dashboards

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.67.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.67.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.67.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.67.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

---

##### FILE: deployment5213_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/adapter-container-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    env: prod
  name: adapter-container-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      env: prod
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        env: prod
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - while true; do echo \<h1\>$(date)\</h1\> >> /html/index.html; sleep 5; done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: kiran2361993/kubegame:v1
        name: adapter-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /html/
          name: shared-vol
      - image: kiran2361993/kubegame:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: main-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: shared-vol
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - git clone https://github.com/saikiranpi/Sidecar_Test.git /html
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: alpine/git
        name: init-container
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup myservice.default.svc.cluster.local; do echo waiting for
          myservice; sleep 2; done
        image: busybox
        name: wait-for-service
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "Init container tasks completed" > /tasks/status.txt
        image: busybox
        name: perform-task
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tasks
          name: shared-vol
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-vol

---

        name: prometheus-config-volume

        name: prometheus-storage-volume

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/docker-registry:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

##### FILE: deployment5223.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/store-backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: store-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          value: postgresql://$(POSTGRES_USER):$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@postgres:5432/$(POSTGRES_DB)
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-access
        image: pluralsight_backend:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/
            port: api
        name: backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: api
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/
            port: api
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready -h postgres -p 5432; do echo waiting for database; sleep
          2; done;
        image: postgres:9.6.5
        name: check-db-ready

---

            path: /

          periodSeconds: 10

            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:

            memory: 512Mi

##### FILE: deployment5232.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/tainter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: tainter
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: tainter
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 0
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: tainter
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - tainter
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 10
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config-file=/etc/config/config.toml
        image: lassehels/tainter:1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: tainter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 60m
            memory: 80Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 30m
            memory: 30Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: tainter
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: tainter-config
        name: config

---

        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.12.0

      containers:

            path: /healthz
            port: 8080

          name: http-metrics

            path: /

          timeoutSeconds: 5

          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/bifrost-queue-broker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: bifrost-queue-broker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bifrost-queue-broker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: bifrost-queue-broker
        try: "0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: bifrost-queue-broker-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: bifrost-queue-broker-secret
        image: ghcr.io/ssi-dk/bifrost-queue-broker:v0.3.5
        name: bifrost-queue-broker
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/client.key
          name: tbr-client-key
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/client.pem
          name: tbr-client-cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/SOFI_ROOT.pem
          name: tbr-ca-cert
          readOnly: true
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sofi-tbr-integration-dev
        ip: 192.168.113.12
      - hostnames:
        - fvstlimsapp01t.prod.sitad.dk
        ip: 192.168.65.3
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/client.key
          type: File
        name: tbr-client-key
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/client.pem
          type: File
        name: tbr-client-cert
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/SOFI_ROOT.pem
          type: File
        name: tbr-ca-cert

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: microreact
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: microreact
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: microreact
        try: "0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: microreact-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: microreact-secret
        image: ghcr.io/ssi-dk/microreact:v2.3.3
        name: microreact
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: microreact-logs
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /app/config.js
          name: microreact-config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/files
          name: microreact-files
          readOnly: false
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/microreact/logs
          type: Directory
        name: microreact-logs
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/microreact/config.js
          type: File
        name: microreact-config
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/microreact/files
          type: Directory
        name: microreact-files

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rabbitmq
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rabbitmq
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: rabbitmq
        try: "0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: rabbitmq-secret
        image: rabbitmq:4.0.2-management
        name: rabbitmq
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5672
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15672
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.conf
          name: rabbitmq-config
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/rabbitmq/rabbitmq.conf
          type: File
        name: rabbitmq-config

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sap-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sap-api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: sap-api
        try: "0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - /app/start.sh
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: sap-api-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: sap-api-secret
        image: ghcr.io/ssi-dk/sap-api:v0.0.24
        name: sap-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6000
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/client.key
          name: tbr-client-key
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/client.pem
          name: tbr-client-cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /app/.certs/SOFI_ROOT.pem
          name: tbr-ca-cert
          readOnly: true
      hostAliases:
      - hostnames:
        - sofi-tbr-integration-dev
        ip: 192.168.113.12
      - hostnames:
        - fvstlimsapp01t.prod.sitad.dk
        ip: 192.168.65.3
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/client.key
          type: File
        name: tbr-client-key
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/client.pem
          type: File
        name: tbr-client-cert
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/sofi/secrets/certificates/tbr/SOFI_ROOT.pem
          type: File
        name: tbr-ca-cert

##### FILE: deployment529.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongo-deployment
  name: mongo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongo-deployment
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongo-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-secret
        image: mongo:6.0.3
        name: mongo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---


Mutation:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-application
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: my-application:latest
    livenessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /actuator/health
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 5
    name: my-application
    nodeSelector:
      environment: ${ENVIRONMENT}
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
    readinessProbe:
      httpGet:
        path: /actuator/health
        port: 8080
      initialDelaySeconds: 5
      periodSeconds: 5
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-application
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-application
    spec: null

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-user
              name: grafana
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: grafana
        image: grafana/grafana:8.3.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          name: config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboardproviders.yaml
          name: dashboards
          subPath: dashboardproviders.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards/kubernetes/prometheus.json
          name: prometheus-dashboard
          subPath: prometheus.json
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards/kubernetes/prometheus-operator.json
          name: prometheus-operator-dashboard
          subPath: prometheus-operator.json
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards/kubernetes/grafana.json
          name: grafana-dashboard
          subPath: grafana.json
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards/kubernetes/cert-manager.json
          name: cert-manager-dashboard
          subPath: cert-manager.json
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - chown
        - -R
        - 472:472
        - /var/lib/grafana
        image: busybox:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: init-chown-data
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: storage
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        runAsUser: 472
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana
        name: config
      - configMap:
          name: dashboards
        name: dashboards
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana
      - configMap:
          name: datasources
        name: datasources
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-dashboard
        name: prometheus-dashboard
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-operator-dashboard
        name: prometheus-operator-dashboard
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-dashboard
        name: grafana-dashboard
      - configMap:
          name: cert-manager-dashboard
        name: cert-manager-dashboard

          name: metrics

          name: tls-ca
          readOnly: true

          name: tls-secret
          readOnly: true
          subPathExpr: 847a4797b0b13045ba3c76ff71dd689334b2f15b25857791c0e88ac39983d03e.pem
      volumes:
      - name: tls-ca
        secret:
          defaultMode: 416
          secretName: mongodb-external-key-pair
      - name: tls-secret
        secret:
          defaultMode: 416
          secretName: my-mongodb-server-certificate-key

kind: Deployment
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.53.1
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.53.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.53.1
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.53.1
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: env
              name: config
        image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: credentials
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: credentials
        name: credentials

          valueFrom:

              key: region
              name: region

          valueFrom:

              name: password

##### FILE: deployment5319.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to staging/Deployment/go-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-app
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - go-app
                  - rust-app
              topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: 424432388155.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/go-app:0.1.2
        name: go-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to istio-system/Deployment/istiod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: istiod
    install.operator.istio.io/owning-resource: unknown
    istio: pilot
    istio.io/rev: default
    operator.istio.io/component: Pilot
    release: driver
  name: istiod
  namespace: istio-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      istio: pilot
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 100%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "15014"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "false"
      labels:
        app: istiod
        install.operator.istio.io/owning-resource: unknown
        istio: pilot
        istio.io/rev: default
        operator.istio.io/component: Pilot
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "false"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - discovery
        - --monitoringAddr=:15014
        - --log_output_level=default:info
        - --domain
        - cluster.local
        - --keepaliveMaxServerConnectionAge
        - 30m
        env:
        - name: REVISION
          value: default
        - name: JWT_POLICY
          value: third-party-jwt
        - name: PILOT_CERT_PROVIDER
          value: istiod
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: KUBECONFIG
          value: /var/run/secrets/remote/config
        - name: PILOT_TRACE_SAMPLING
          value: "1"
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_PROTOCOL_SNIFFING_FOR_OUTBOUND
          value: "true"
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_PROTOCOL_SNIFFING_FOR_INBOUND
          value: "true"
        - name: ISTIOD_ADDR
          value: istiod.istio-system.svc:15012
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_ANALYSIS
          value: "false"
        - name: CLUSTER_ID
          value: Kubernetes
        image: docker.io/istio/pilot:1.16.1
        name: discovery
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15010
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15017
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2048Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 1337
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1337
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/tokens
          name: istio-token
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istio-dns
          name: local-certs
        - mountPath: /etc/cacerts
          name: cacerts
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/remote
          name: istio-kubeconfig
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istiod/tls
          name: istio-csr-dns-cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istiod/ca
          name: istio-csr-ca-configmap
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: istiod
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: local-certs
      - name: istio-token
        projected:
          sources:
          - serviceAccountToken:
              audience: istio-ca
              expirationSeconds: 43200
              path: istio-token
      - name: cacerts
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: cacerts
      - name: istio-kubeconfig
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istio-kubeconfig
      - name: istio-csr-dns-cert
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istiod-tls
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: istio-ca-root-cert
          optional: true
        name: istio-csr-ca-configmap

              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: KUBECONFIG
          value: /var/run/secrets/remote/config
        - name: PILOT_TRACE_SAMPLING
          value: "1"
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_PROTOCOL_SNIFFING_FOR_OUTBOUND
          value: "true"
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_PROTOCOL_SNIFFING_FOR_INBOUND
          value: "true"
        - name: ISTIOD_ADDR
          value: istiod.istio-system.svc:15012
        - name: PILOT_ENABLE_ANALYSIS
          value: "false"
        - name: CLUSTER_ID
          value: Kubernetes
        image: docker.io/istio/pilot:1.16.1
        name: discovery
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15010
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 15017
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2048Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 1337
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1337
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/tokens
          name: istio-token
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istio-dns
          name: local-certs
        - mountPath: /etc/cacerts
          name: cacerts
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/remote
          name: istio-kubeconfig
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istiod/tls
          name: istio-csr-dns-cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/run/secrets/istiod/ca
          name: istio-csr-ca-configmap
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1337
      serviceAccountName: istiod
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: local-certs
      - name: istio-token
        projected:
          sources:
          - serviceAccountToken:
              audience: istio-ca
              expirationSeconds: 43200
              path: istio-token
      - name: cacerts
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: cacerts
      - name: istio-kubeconfig
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istio-kubeconfig
      - name: istio-csr-dns-cert
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istiod-tls
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: istio-ca-root-cert
          optional: true
        name: istio-csr-ca-configmap

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to istio-system/Deployment/kiali:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kiali
  namespace: istio-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: kiali
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kiali
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kiali
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: kiali
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kiali
        helm.sh/chart: kiali-server-1.61.0
      name: kiali
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/kiali/kiali
        - -config
        - /kiali-configuration/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: ACTIVE_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: info
        - name: LOG_FORMAT
          value: text
        - name: LOG_TIME_FIELD_FORMAT
          value: 2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00
        - name: LOG_SAMPLER_RATE
          value: "1"
        image: quay.io/kiali/kiali:v1.59
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /kiali/healthz
            port: api-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: kiali
        ports:
        - containerPort: 20001
          name: api-port
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http-metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /kiali/healthz
            port: api-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /kiali-configuration
          name: kiali-configuration
        - mountPath: /kiali-cert
          name: kiali-cert
        - mountPath: /kiali-secret
          name: kiali-secret
        - mountPath: /kiali-cabundle
          name: kiali-cabundle
      serviceAccountName: kiali
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: kiali
        name: kiali-configuration
      - name: kiali-cert
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istio.kiali-service-account
      - name: kiali-secret
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: kiali
      - configMap:
          name: kiali-cabundle
          optional: true
        name: kiali-cabundle

---

##### FILE: deployment5325.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to minio/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: minio
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio
        istio: monitor
      name: minio
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - service-a
                - service-b
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - golang
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -ce
        - /usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh minio server /export -S /etc/minio/certs/
          --address :9000 --console-address :9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootUser
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootPassword
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_PROMETHEUS_AUTH_TYPE
          value: public
        image: quay.io/minio/minio:RELEASE.2022-12-12T19-27-27Z
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9001
          name: http-console
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/credentials
          name: minio-user
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /export
          name: export
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: export
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: minio
      - name: minio-user
        secret:
          secretName: minio

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
      version: 6.0.2
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
        istio: monitor
        version: 6.0.2
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - service-a
                - service-b
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - golang
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BITNAMI_DEBUG
          value: "false"
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_USER
          value: root
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_SYSTEM_LOG_VERBOSITY
          value: "0"
        - name: MONGODB_DISABLE_SYSTEM_LOG
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_DISABLE_JAVASCRIPT
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_JOURNAL
          value: "yes"
        - name: MONGODB_PORT_NUMBER
          value: "27017"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_IPV6
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_DIRECTORY_PER_DB
          value: "no"
        image: docker.io/bitnami/mongodb:6.0.2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bitnami/scripts/ping-mongodb.sh
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bitnami/scripts/readiness-probe.sh
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 4Gi
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: datadir
          subPath: null
        - mountPath: /bitnami/scripts
          name: common-scripts
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        sysctls: []
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 360
          name: mongodb-common-scripts
        name: common-scripts
      - name: datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-app
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: go-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - java-app
                - go-app
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - staging
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
          value: us-west-rack1
        image: 424432388155.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/go-app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: go-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config.yaml
          name: config
          subPath: config.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: service
        name: config

                - mongodb

            - staging
            - minio
            - mongodb

        - -jar
        - /app/java-app.jar
        command:
        - java

          value: mongodb://root:devops123@mongodb.mongodb:27017/?retryWrites=true&w=majority

          value: http://minio.minio:9000

##### FILE: deployment5330.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to minio/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: minio
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: minio
      name: minio
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - java-app
                - go-app
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - staging
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -ce
        - /usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh minio server /export -S /etc/minio/certs/
          --address :9000 --console-address :9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootUser
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootPassword
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_PROMETHEUS_AUTH_TYPE
          value: public
        image: quay.io/minio/minio:RELEASE.2022-12-12T19-27-27Z
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9001
          name: http-console
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/credentials
          name: minio-user
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /export
          name: export
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: export
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: minio
      - name: minio-user
        secret:
          secretName: minio

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mongodb/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: mongodb
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
      version: 6.0.2
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        linkerd.io/inject: enabled
      labels:
        app: mongodb
        version: 6.0.2
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - java-app
                - go-app
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - staging
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BITNAMI_DEBUG
          value: "false"
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_USER
          value: root
        - name: MONGODB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongodb-root-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_SYSTEM_LOG_VERBOSITY
          value: "0"
        - name: MONGODB_DISABLE_SYSTEM_LOG
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_DISABLE_JAVASCRIPT
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_JOURNAL
          value: "yes"
        - name: MONGODB_PORT_NUMBER
          value: "27017"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_IPV6
          value: "no"
        - name: MONGODB_ENABLE_DIRECTORY_PER_DB
          value: "no"
        image: docker.io/bitnami/mongodb:6.0.2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bitnami/scripts/ping-mongodb.sh
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
          name: mongodb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bitnami/scripts/readiness-probe.sh
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 4Gi
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /bitnami/mongodb
          name: datadir
          subPath: null
        - mountPath: /bitnami/scripts
          name: common-scripts
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1001
        sysctls: []
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 360
          name: mongodb-common-scripts
        name: common-scripts
      - name: datadir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb

---

##### FILE: deployment5332.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-user
              name: grafana
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: grafana
        image: grafana/grafana:9.3.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          name: config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboardproviders.yaml
          name: dashboards
          subPath: dashboardproviders.yaml
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        runAsUser: 472
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana
      - configMap:
          name: grafana
        name: config
      - configMap:
          name: datasources
        name: datasources
      - configMap:
          name: dashboards
        name: dashboards

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.7.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.62.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.62.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to staging/Deployment/go-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-app
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - general
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - go-app
                - rust-app
            namespaces:
            - staging
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TLS_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        image: aputra/go-app-lesson147:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: go-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50050
          name: grpc
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi

##### FILE: deployment5336.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-user
              name: grafana
        - name: GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: admin-password
              name: grafana
        image: grafana/grafana:9.3.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/health
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/grafana.ini
          name: config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards/dashboardproviders.yaml
          name: dashboards
          subPath: dashboardproviders.yaml
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        runAsUser: 472
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana
      - configMap:
          name: grafana
        name: config
      - configMap:
          name: datasources
        name: datasources
      - configMap:
          name: dashboards
        name: dashboards

---

##### FILE: deployment5337.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.7.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment5338.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.62.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.62.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

---

##### FILE: deployment5339.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to staging/Deployment/rust-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rust-app
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rust-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rust-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - general
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - rust-app
                - go-app
            namespaces:
            - staging
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TLS_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        image: aputra/rust-app-lesson147:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: rust-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50050
          name: grpc
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi

---

            secretKeyRef:

            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - general
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - go-app
            namespaces:
            - staging
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: aputra/go-app-amd64-lesson150:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: go-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 512Mi

##### FILE: deployment5347.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.62.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.62.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.62.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

---

##### FILE: deployment5348.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to staging/Deployment/go-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: go-app
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: go-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: go-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - general
      containers:
      - args:
        - -certFile
        - /etc/ssl/certs/app-vm-antonputra-pvt.pem
        - -keyFile
        - /etc/ssl/private/app-vm-antonputra-pvt-key.pem
        image: aputra/go-app-lesson151:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: go-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 16Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 16Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/app-vm-antonputra-pvt.pem
          name: tls
          subPath: tls.crt
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/private/app-vm-antonputra-pvt-key.pem
          name: tls
          subPath: tls.key
      volumes:
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: app-pod-antonputra-pvt

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: staging

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: grpc-client

      labels:
        app: grpc-client
    spec:

        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:

              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - grpc-client
                - grpc-server

        ports:

          name: metrics

        - containerPort: 443
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 16Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 16Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/app-vm-antonputra-pvt.pem
          name: tls
          subPath: tls.crt
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/private/app-vm-antonputra-pvt-key.pem
          name: tls
          subPath: tls.key
      volumes:
      - name: tls
        secret:
          secretName: app-pod-antonputra-pvt
