policy add-safe-to-evict applied to istio-system/Deployment/kiali:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kiali
  namespace: istio-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: kiali
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kiali
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kiali
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: kiali
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kiali
      name: kiali
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /opt/kiali/kiali
        - -config
        - /kiali-configuration/config.yaml
        env:
        - name: ACTIVE_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: info
        - name: LOG_FORMAT
          value: text
        - name: LOG_TIME_FIELD_FORMAT
          value: 2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00
        - name: LOG_SAMPLER_RATE
          value: "1"
        image: quay.io/kiali/kiali:v1.64.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /kiali/healthz
            port: api-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: kiali
        ports:
        - containerPort: 20001
          name: api-port
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: http-metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /kiali/healthz
            port: api-port
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 30
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /kiali-configuration
          name: kiali-configuration
        - mountPath: /kiali-cert
          name: kiali-cert
        - mountPath: /kiali-secret
          name: kiali-secret
        - mountPath: /kiali-cabundle
          name: kiali-cabundle
      serviceAccountName: kiali
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: kiali
        name: kiali-configuration
      - name: kiali-cert
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: istio.kiali-service-account
      - name: kiali-secret
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: kiali
      - configMap:
          name: kiali-cabundle
          optional: true
        name: kiali-cabundle

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to minio/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: minio
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minio
        istio: monitor
      name: minio
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - service-a
                - service-b
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - golang
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -ce
        - /usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh minio server /export -S /etc/minio/certs/
          --address :9000 --console-address :9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootUser
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootPassword
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_PROMETHEUS_AUTH_TYPE
          value: public
        image: quay.io/minio/minio:RELEASE.2023-05-04T21-44-30Z
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9001
          name: http-console
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/credentials
          name: minio-user
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /export
          name: export
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: export
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: minio
      - name: minio-user
        secret:
          secretName: minio

---

  template:

            name: db-config

            name: queue-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: api-config

        name: service

        - containerPort: 8000

          name: blob-storage

      - command:
        - sh
        - /scripts/set-permissions.sh
        - /data

        name: blob-storage-permissions

          name: blob-storage
        - mountPath: /scripts
          name: blob-storage-permissions
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-config
        image: api-db-migration:latest
        name: db-migration
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: blob-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: blob-storage-disk-claim
      - configMap:
          mode: 484
          name: blob-storage-disk-permissions
        name: blob-storage-permissions

##### FILE: deployment5363.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.67.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.67.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.67.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.67.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

---

          timeoutSeconds: 5

          name: http-metrics

          name: telemetry

            memory: 128Mi

          subPath: dashboard-v1.json

          subPath: dashboard-v2.json
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/dashboards/kubernetes/flagger-v1.json
          name: flagger-v1
          subPath: flagger-v1.json

##### FILE: deployment5369.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/minio:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minio
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minio
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: minio
        istio: monitor
      name: minio
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - service-a
                - service-b
                - minio
                - mongodb
            namespaces:
            - golang
            - minio
            - mongodb
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -ce
        - /usr/bin/docker-entrypoint.sh minio server /export -S /etc/minio/certs/
          --address :9000 --console-address :9001
        env:
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootUser
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootPassword
              name: minio
        - name: MINIO_PROMETHEUS_AUTH_TYPE
          value: public
        image: quay.io/minio/minio:RELEASE.2023-10-25T06-33-25Z
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: minio
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: http
        - containerPort: 9001
          name: http-console
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/credentials
          name: minio-user
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /export
          name: export
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: export
      - name: minio-user
        secret:
          secretName: minio

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: converter
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: converter
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: converter
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: queue-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: converter-config
        image: converter-service:latest
        name: converter
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/blob-storage
          name: blob-storage
      volumes:
      - name: blob-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: blob-storage-disk-claim

          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

##### FILE: deployment5374.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-adapter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: metrics-adapter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-adapter
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.1
  name: prometheus-adapter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: metrics-adapter
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-adapter
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: metrics-adapter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-adapter
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.11.1
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cert-dir=/var/run/serving-cert
        - --config=/etc/adapter/config.yaml
        - --metrics-relist-interval=1m
        - --prometheus-url=http://prometheus-operated.monitoring.svc:9090/
        - --secure-port=6443
        - --v=4
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_256_CBC_SHA
        image: registry.k8s.io/prometheus-adapter/prometheus-adapter:v0.11.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: prometheus-adapter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmpfs
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /var/run/serving-cert
          name: volume-serving-cert
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /etc/adapter
          name: config
          readOnly: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-adapter
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmpfs
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: volume-serving-cert
      - configMap:
          name: adapter-config
        name: config

---

  namespace: default

  replicas: 2

    matchLabels:
      server: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate

    metadata:
      labels:
        server: nginx

        name: nginxcontainer

            memory: 128Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo:7.0
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-volume-claim

---

##### FILE: Deployment5387.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-pod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-pod
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/hpa-example
        name: my-pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgresdb
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgresdb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgresdb
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-secret-credentials
        image: postgres:14-alpine
        name: postgresdb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgres/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - name: db-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-volume-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment5401.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to website/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
  namespace: website
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gurve/task1_nonroot:v0.2.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: ""
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ""
  name: ""
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ""

        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: ""
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: tomcat:8.0
        name: tomcat
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

        - tail
        - -f
        - /dev/null
        image: busybox:1.34.1
        name: war-downloader
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: webapps-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: webapps-volume

##### FILE: deployment5414.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to chrony/Deployment/chrony-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: chrony-deployment
  namespace: chrony
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: chrony
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: chrony
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - network
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NTP_SERVERS
          value: time.cloudflare.com
        - name: ENABLE_NTS
          value: "true"
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/dockur/chrony:4.6.1
        name: chrony
        ports:
        - containerPort: 123
          protocol: UDP

---

##### FILE: deployment5415.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudflared/Deployment/cloudflared-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: cloudflared-deployment
  namespace: cloudflared
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudflared
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cloudflared
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - tunnel
        - --config
        - /etc/cloudflared/config/config.yaml
        - run
        image: cr.nathanv.app/docker.io/cloudflare/cloudflared:2025.2.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 2000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: cloudflared
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/cloudflared/config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/cloudflared/creds
          name: creds
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: creds
        secret:
          secretName: tunnel-credentials
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: cloudflared-configmap
        name: config

---

        - name: TECHNITIUM_HOST
          value: http://technitium-dns-service.technitium-dns.svc.cluster.local:5380

        - secretRef:
            name: k8s-dns-env
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/nathanvaughn/k8s-dns:0.1.3

          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
        name: k8s-dns

        role: apps

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to octoprint/StatefulSet/octoprint-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: octoprint-deployment
  namespace: octoprint
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: octoprint
  serviceName: octoprint
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: octoprint
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENABLE_MJPG_STREAMER
          value: "true"
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: cr.nathanv.app/docker.io/octoprint/octoprint:1.10.3

kind: StatefulSet

  name: omada-deployment
  namespace: omada
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: omada
  serviceName: omada
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: omada
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: role
                operator: In
                values:
                - network
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PUID
          value: "508"
        - name: PGID
          value: "508"
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Chicago
        image: cr.nathanv.app/docker.io/mbentley/omada-controller:5.15.20.16
        name: omada
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8088
          name: manage-http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8043
          name: manage-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8843
          name: portal-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29812
          name: adopt-v1
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 27001
          name: app-discovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 29810
          name: discovery
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 29811
          name: manager-v1
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29814
          name: manager-v2
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29815
          name: transfer-v2
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29816
          name: rtty
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 29813
          name: upgrade-v1
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/data
          name: omada-vol-data
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/logs
          name: omada-vol-logs
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - chown -R 508:508 /opt/tplink/EAPController/
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: cr.nathanv.app/docker.io/library/busybox:1.37.0
        name: permission-fix
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/data
          name: omada-vol-data
        - mountPath: /opt/tplink/EAPController/logs
          name: omada-vol-logs
      volumes:
      - name: omada-vol-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: omada-pvc-data
      - name: omada-vol-logs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: omada-pvc-logs

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: stirling-pdf-deployment
  namespace: stirling-pdf

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: stirling-pdf
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stirling-pdf
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_ENABLE_SECURITY
          value: "true"
        - name: SECURITY_ENABLE_LOGIN
          value: "true"
        - name: SECURITY_LOGIN_METHOD
          value: oauth2
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_ISSUER
          value: https://authentik.nathanv.app/application/o/stirling-pdf/
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_AUTOCREATEUSER
          value: "true"
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_USEASUSERNAME
          value: preferred_username
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_SCOPES
          value: openid,profile,email
        - name: SECURITY_OAUTH2_PROVIDER
          value: Authentik
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: stirling-pdf-env
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/stirling-tools/stirling-pdf:0.44.3-fat
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /api/v1/info/status
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: stirling-pdf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/tessdata
          name: stirling-pdf-vol-ocr
        - mountPath: /configs
          name: stirling-pdf-vol-configs
      nodeSelector:
        role: apps
      volumes:
      - name: stirling-pdf-vol-ocr
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: stirling-pdf-pvc-ocr
      - name: stirling-pdf-vol-configs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: stirling-pdf-pvc-configs

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/custom-metrics-consumer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    application: custom-metrics-consumer
    version: latest
  name: custom-metrics-consumer
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      application: custom-metrics-consumer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        application: custom-metrics-consumer
        version: latest
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --fake-queue-length=2000
        image: mikkeloscar/custom-metrics-consumer:latest
        name: custom-metrics-consumer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 25Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment5432.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/the-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    apiserver: "true"
  name: wardle-server
  namespace: wardle
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      apiserver: "true"
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        apiserver: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --etcd-servers=http://localhost:2379
        image: kube-sample-apiserver:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: wardle-server
      - image: gcr.io/etcd-development/etcd:v3.5.12
        name: etcd
      serviceAccountName: apiserver

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gitlab-ce:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: gitlab-ce
  name: gitlab-ce
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gitlab-ce
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gitlab-ce
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GITLAB_OMNIBUS_CONFIG
          value: external_url 'http://gitlab:9090';prometheus_monitoring['enable']
            = false;nginx['proxy_set_headers'] = { 'X-Forwarded-Proto' => 'http',
            'X-Forward-Port' => '9090', 'Host' => 'gitlab:9090' };puma['worker_processes']
            = 0;sidekiq['max_concurrency'] = 10
        - name: HOSTNAME
          value: gitlab
        - name: GITLAB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: P@ssw0rd!
        image: docker.io/gitlab/gitlab-ce:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: gitlab-ce
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment5438.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: racascao/hello-go:v5.1
        name: goserver
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/senhas
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-pvc
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-pvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: senhas
            path: senhas.txt
          name: configmap-senhas
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment5441.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello-server
  name: hello-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: blux2/hello-server:1.8
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: hello-server
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 256Mi

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: service-{SERVICENAME}-deployment
  namespace: devops
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: DJANGO_RUNNING_MIGRATIONS
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: DJANGO_RUNNING_MIGRATIONS
          name: service-{SERVICENAME}-secret
    - name: DEBUG
      valueFrom:
        secretKeyRef:
          key: DEBUG
          name: service-{SERVICENAME}-secret
    image:
      DOCKERIMAGEN: null
    name: microservice-enid
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
  volumes:
  - name: secret-volume
    secret:
      secretName: service-{SERVICENAME}-secret

##### FILE: deployment5446.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_PATHS_CONFIG
          value: /var/lib/grafana/graf-suchi.ini
        image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana/graf-suchi.ini
          name: grafana-config
          readOnly: false
          subPath: graf-suchi.ini
      volumes:
      - name: grafana-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-config
        name: grafana-config
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.9.2
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.9.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.9.2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment5457.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nodejs-sample-image:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nodejs-sample-image
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: harshkhare-node-latest
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: harshkhare-node-latest
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: IMAGE_TAG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: TAG
              name: image-tag-config
        image: 851725513395.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/rest-api:${TAG}
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nodejs-sample-image
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: my-volume
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerhub-secret
      volumes:
      - name: my-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vault-agent-injector:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: vault
    app.kubernetes.io/name: vault-agent-injector
    component: webhook
  name: vault-agent-injector
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: vault
      app.kubernetes.io/name: vault-agent-injector
      component: webhook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: vault
        app.kubernetes.io/name: vault-agent-injector
        component: webhook
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                app.kubernetes.io/instance: vault
                app.kubernetes.io/name: vault-agent-injector
                component: webhook
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - args:
        - agent-inject
        - 2>&1
        env:
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_LISTEN
          value: :8080
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_LOG_LEVEL
          value: info
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_VAULT_ADDR
          value: http://vault.default.svc:8200
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_VAULT_AUTH_PATH
          value: auth/kubernetes
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_VAULT_IMAGE
          value: hashicorp/vault:1.8.0
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_TLS_AUTO
          value: vault-agent-injector-cfg
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_TLS_AUTO_HOSTS
          value: vault-agent-injector-svc,vault-agent-injector-svc.default,vault-agent-injector-svc.default.svc
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_LOG_FORMAT
          value: standard
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_REVOKE_ON_SHUTDOWN
          value: "false"
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_CPU_REQUEST
          value: 250m
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_CPU_LIMIT
          value: 500m
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_MEM_REQUEST
          value: 64Mi
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_MEM_LIMIT
          value: 128Mi
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE
          value: map
        - name: AGENT_INJECT_TEMPLATE_CONFIG_EXIT_ON_RETRY_FAILURE
          value: "true"
        image: hashicorp/vault-k8s:0.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health/ready
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: sidecar-injector
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health/ready
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      hostNetwork: false
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 100
      serviceAccountName: vault-agent-injector

##### FILE: deployment5468.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wordpress/Deployment/wordpress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: wordpress
  namespace: wordpress
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wordpress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wordpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SOURCE
          value: pre-wordpress
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: mysql-wordpress
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_NAME
          value: wordpress
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          value: user
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: proyecto-password
              name: proyecto-secret
        - name: SIMPLE
          value: simple-wordpress
        image: udeccolima/wordpress:simplesaml
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/wordpress/public_content
          name: public-content
        - mountPath: /var/www/private_content
          name: private-content
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: my-docker-credentials
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          chown -R www-data:www-data /mnt/public_content &&
          chown -R www-data:www-data /mnt/private_content &&
          chmod -R 770 /mnt/public_content &&
          chmod -R 770 /mnt/private_content
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-chown
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/public_content
          name: public-content
        - mountPath: /mnt/private_content
          name: private-content
      volumes:
      - name: public-content
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: public-content-pvc
      - name: private-content
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: private-content-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --metric-labels-allowlist=pods=[*],deployments=[*],cronjobs=[*],jobs=[*]
        image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment5477_7.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/metrics-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: metrics-server
  name: metrics-server
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: metrics-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: metrics-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cert-dir=/tmp
        - --secure-port=10250
        - --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname
        - --kubelet-use-node-status-port
        - --metric-resolution=15s
        - --kubelet-insecure-tls
        image: registry.k8s.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.7.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /livez
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: metrics-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10250
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: https
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      serviceAccountName: metrics-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp-dir

---

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nextjs
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nextjs
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL
          value: http://api-service:5000
        image: nextjs-app-new:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nextjs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

          name: hello-world

            memory: 384Mi

##### FILE: deployment5489.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pihole/Deployment/pihole:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pihole
  namespace: pihole
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pihole
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pihole
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: pihole/pihole:latest
        name: pihole
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        - containerPort: 53
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: UDP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole
          name: pihole-data
          subPath: etc-pihole
        - mountPath: /etc/dnsmasq.d
          name: pihole-data
          subPath: etc-dnsmasq.d
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole/pihole-FTL.conf
          name: pihole-ftl-conf
          subPath: pihole-FTL.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole/adlists.list
          name: custom-adlist
          subPath: adlists.list
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole/regex.list
          name: reglist
          subPath: regex.list
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp /tmp/pihole-FTL.conf /etc/pihole/pihole-FTL.conf
        image: busybox
        name: setup-pihole-config
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: pihole-ftl-conf
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole
          name: pihole-data
      volumes:
      - name: pihole-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pihole-data
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: pihole-FTL.conf
            path: pihole-FTL.conf
          name: pihole-ftl-conf
        name: pihole-ftl-conf
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: reglist
            path: regex.list
          name: pihole-env
        name: reglist
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: adlist
            path: adlists.list
          name: pihole-env
        name: custom-adlist

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/second-app-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    group: example
  name: second-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: second-app
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: second-app
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: venk89/kub-first-app
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: second-node

---

##### FILE: deployment550.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/git-repo-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: git-repo-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: git-repo-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: git-repo-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/kutespaces/simple-git-http-server:latest
        name: git-repo-server
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /git/manifests/info/refs?service=git-receive-pack
            port: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /git
          name: git-repo-volume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - |
          git init --bare /git/manifests.git
          cd /git/manifests.git
          git symbolic-ref HEAD refs/heads/main
          git config http.receivepack true
        image: alpine/git
        name: init-repo
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /git
          name: git-repo-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: git-repo-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

2 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

##### FILE: deployment551.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#00A36C'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

---

          value: "3"

          value: 10s

        name: nginx-api

        - server
        - --config-file=/run/secrets/api/api-config.yaml

          readOnly: true

          - key: api-config.yaml

##### FILE: deployment5511.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGINX_PORT
          value: "80"
        - name: SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: ASSETS_DIR
          value: /var/www/assets
        - name: BACKEND_HOST
          value: localhost:8280
        - name: BACKEND_MAX_FAILS
          value: "3"
        - name: BACKEND_FAIL_TIMEOUT
          value: 10s
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-nginx-web:v0.1.0
        name: nginx-web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/assets
          name: assets-volume
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - server
        - --api-address=http://api:80
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-web:v0.1.0
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8280
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp -r /go/src/github.com/gihyodocker/taskapp/assets/* /var/www/assets
        image: ghcr.io/gihyodocker/taskapp-web:v0.1.0
        name: init
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/assets
          name: assets-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: assets-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment552.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 3
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 60
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9797"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#00A36C'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: bluepill
  name: bluepill
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: bluepill
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: bluepill
      name: bluepill
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: bluepill
        image: docker.io/hoeg/bluepill:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: bluepill
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - all
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /secrets
          name: tls-volume
        - mountPath: /config/whitelist.txt
          name: whitelist-volume
          subPath: whitelist.txt
      volumes:
      - name: tls-volume
        secret:
          secretName: bluepill-tls
      - configMap:
          name: bluepill-whitelist
        name: whitelist-volume

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: webcaju/go-kube
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-persistent-volume-claim
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-persistent-volume-claim
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-persistent-volume-claim
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/riv23-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: riv23-demo
  name: riv23-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: riv23-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: riv23-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /mnt/setup/init.sh
        env:
        - name: BUCKET_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: bucket-name
              name: pod-setup
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: cluster-name
              name: pod-setup
        - name: POD_UID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.uid
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        image: public.ecr.aws/amazonlinux/amazonlinux:2023
        name: aws-cli
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: ".5"
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/setup
          name: pod-setup
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /mnt/demo
          name: demo-scripts
          readOnly: false
      serviceAccount: riv23-demo
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: pod-setup
        name: pod-setup
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 493
          name: demo-scripts
        name: demo-scripts

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to synapse/Deployment/coturn:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: coturn
  namespace: synapse
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: coturn
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: coturn
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TURN_CONFIG
          value: /etc/coturn.conf
        - name: CHECK_INTERVAL
          value: "500"
        image: dexxter1911/dynamic-coturn:latest
        name: turn
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/secret
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/coturn.conf
          name: conf
          subPath: coturn.conf
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          secretName: turn.example.org
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: coturn.conf
            path: coturn.conf
          name: coturn-conf
        name: conf

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to devops-tools/Deployment/jenkins:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jenkins
  namespace: devops-tools
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jenkins-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jenkins-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jenkins/jenkins:lts
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: jenkins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: httpport
        - containerPort: 50000
          name: jnlpport
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 900m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
          name: jenkins-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: jenkins-admin
      volumes:
      - name: jenkins-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pvc

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default

##### FILE: deployment5573_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to simple-api/Deployment/simple-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: simple-api
  namespace: simple-api
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: simple-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: simple-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: simple-api
        image: jkaninda/simple-api:rootless
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /internal/health/live
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: simple-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /internal/health/ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 750Mi
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to simple-api/Deployment/redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: redis
  namespace: simple-api
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: redis
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: redis
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - redis-server
        - --appendonly yes
        - --requirepass password
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: simple-api
        image: redis:alpine
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to browseterm/Deployment/container-maker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: container-maker
  name: container-maker
  namespace: browseterm
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: container-maker
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: container-maker
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SERVER_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: server.key
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: SERVER_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: server.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CLIENT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.key
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CLIENT_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: client.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        - name: CA_CRT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ca.crt
              name: grpc-certs
        image: zim95/container-maker:latest
        name: container-maker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50051
      volumes: []

##### FILE: deployment5584.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/$APP_NAME:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: $APP_NAME
  name: $APP_NAME
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: $APP_NAME
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: $APP_NAME
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: $DOCKER_REPO:$IMAGE_NAME
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: $APP_NAME
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8098
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: aws-registry-key

---

##### FILE: deployment5585.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/k8s-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: k8s
  name: k8s-deployment
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8s
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8s
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ozgurozturknet/k8s:v1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthcheck
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: k8s
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 3
      nodeSelector:
        tier: production
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: tier
        operator: Equal
        value: production

---

##### FILE: deployment559.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=ingress
        - --domain-filter=piny940.com
        - --provider=cloudflaretunnel
        - --txt-owner-id=$(OWNER_ID)
        env:
        - name: OWNER_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: OWNER_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: CF_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloudflare-token
              name: external-dns-secret
        - name: CF_TUNNEL_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CF_TUNNEL_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: CF_ACCOUNT_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CF_ACCOUNT_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: SLACK_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: slack-token
              name: external-dns-secret
        - name: SLACK_CHANNEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_CHANNEL
              name: external-dns-conf
        image: external-dns
        name: external-dns
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

---

            port: 8080

            name: k8s-status-badge-conf

            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

          failureThreshold: 3

            path: /healthz
            port: 8080

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/minikube-sample:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: minikube-sample
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minikube-sample
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minikube-sample
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: env.namespace
          value: default
        image: minikube-sample:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: minikube-sample
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: minikube-sample
        name: config

##### FILE: deployment5615.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/yelp-camp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: yelp-camp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: yelp-camp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: yelp-camp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        - name: CLOUDINARY_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CLOUDINARY_KEY
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        - name: CLOUDINARY_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: CLOUDINARY_SECRET
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        - name: MAPBOX_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MAPBOX_TOKEN
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        - name: DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_URL
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        - name: SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SECRET
              name: yelp-camp-secrets
        image: che01tan/camp:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
        name: yelp-camp-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: Deployment5620.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo-app/Deployment/api-golang:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api-golang
  name: api-golang
  namespace: demo-app
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-golang
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-golang
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8000"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: api-golang-database-url
        image: sidpalas/devops-directive-docker-course-api-golang:foobarbaz
        name: api-golang
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

  namespace: demo-app

      app: api-node

      labels:
        app: api-node
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: api-node-database-url
        image: sidpalas/devops-directive-docker-course-api-node:foobarbaz
        name: api-node
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: client-react-nginx
  name: client-react-nginx
  namespace: demo-app
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: client-react-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: client-react-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: sidpalas/devops-directive-docker-course-client-react-nginx:foobarbaz
        name: client-react-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-conf
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/das-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: das-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: das-mysql-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: das-mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: das-test-mysql-pv-claim

---

      app: ubuntu
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ubuntu
    spec:

      - command:

        - infinity
        image: ubuntu
        name: ubuntu

          name: volume

kind: Deployment

  name: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-deployment

  template:

      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "1307"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-deployment-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "1307"
        - name: DASH0_DEBUG
          value: "true"

        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: dash0-operator-jvm-spring-boot-test-deployment-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1307
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 1307
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 500Mi
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            ephemeral-storage: 500Mi
            memory: 128Mi

          value: k8s

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: SPARGLIM_DRIVER_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: SPARGLIM_SERVER_CUSTOM_CONFIG

          value: admin

          value: http://minio.minio.svc.cluster.local:9000

          value: "true"

          value: viet1846/spark-iceberg:3.4.1
        - name: SPARGLIM_K8S_IMAGE_PULL_POLICY
          value: Always
        - name: SPARK_EXECUTOR_NUMS
          value: "2"
        - name: SPARGLIM_EXECUTOR_REQUEST_MEMORY
          value: 2G
        - name: SPARGLIM_EXECUTOR_LIMIT_MEMORY
          value: 2G
        - name: SPARGLIM_K8S_EXECUTOR_REQUEST_CORES
          value: "3"
        - name: SPARGLIM_EXECUTOR_CORES
          value: "3"
        - name: SPARGLIM_K8S_EXECUTOR_LIMIT_CORES
          value: "3"
