          value: s3a://lakehouse/
        - name: SPARGLIM_SQL_CATALOG_LAKEHOUSE_TYPE
          value: hive
        - name: SPARGLIM_SQL_CATALOG_LAKEHOUSE_URI
          value: thrift://hive-metastore.metastore.svc.cluster.local:9083
        - name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
          value: us-east-1
        - name: AWS_REGION
          value: us-east-1
        - name: S3_SSL_ENABLE
          value: "false"

        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to data-source/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: data-source
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/joplin-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: joplin-server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: joplin-server
  name: joplin-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: joplin-server
      app.kubernetes.io/name: joplin-server
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 0
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: joplin-server
        app.kubernetes.io/name: joplin-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app.kubernetes.io/name
                operator: In
                values:
                - joplin-server
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APP_BASE_URL
          value: https://joplin.christensencloud.us
        - name: APP_PORT
          value: "22300"
        - name: DB_CLIENT
          value: pg
        - name: NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED
          value: "0"
        - name: POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connection_string
              name: joplin-database-credentials
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Denver
        - name: MAILER_ENABLED
          value: "1"
        - name: MAILER_HOST
          value: smtp.gmail.com
        - name: MAILER_PORT
          value: "465"
        - name: MAILER_SECURE
          value: "1"
        - name: MAILER_AUTH_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: joplin-mailer-credentials
        - name: MAILER_AUTH_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: credential
              name: joplin-mailer-credentials
        - name: MAILER_NOREPLY_EMAIL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: reply_to_address
              name: joplin-mailer-credentials
        - name: MAILER_NOREPLY_NAME
          value: Joplin
        image: joplin/server:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 22300
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: joplin-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 22300
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 22300
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 22300
          timeoutSeconds: 1
      nodeSelector: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kasm/Deployment/kasm:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: kasm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kasm
  name: kasm
  namespace: kasm
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: kasm
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kasm
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: kasm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kasm
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: UTC
        - name: UMASK
          value: "0022"
        - name: UMASK_SET
          value: "0022"
        - name: PUID
          value: "568"
        - name: USER_ID
          value: "568"
        - name: UID
          value: "568"
        - name: PGID
          value: "568"
        - name: GROUP_ID
          value: "568"
        - name: GID
          value: "568"
        - name: KASM_PORT
          value: "443"
        image: lscr.io/linuxserver/kasm:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kasm
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: admin
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: main
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 8000m
            memory: 8Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 4Gi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            - CHOWN
            - SETUID
            - SETGID
            - FOWNER
            - DAC_OVERRIDE
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsNonRoot: false
          runAsUser: 0
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 60
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt
          name: data
        - mountPath: /dev/shm
          name: devshm
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: shared
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
        - mountPath: /var/logs
          name: varlogs
        - mountPath: /var/run
          name: varrun
      dnsConfig:
        options:
        - name: ndots
          value: "1"
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      enableServiceLinks: false
      nodeSelector: {}
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 568
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        supplementalGroups:
        - 568
        sysctls:
        - name: net.ipv4.ip_unprivileged_port_start
          value: "443"
      serviceAccount: default
      serviceAccountName: default
      shareProcessNamespace: false
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kasm-data
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory
        name: devshm
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: varlogs
      - emptyDir:
          medium: Memory

##### FILE: deployment5654.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to media/Deployment/deluge:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: deluge
  name: deluge
  namespace: media
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: deluge
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: deluge
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VPN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: pia-credentials
        - name: VPN_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: credential
              name: pia-credentials
        - name: VPN_ENABLED
          value: "yes"
        - name: VPN_PROV
          value: pia
        - name: VPN_CLIENT
          value: openvpn
        - name: LAN_NETWORK
          value: 10.0.6.0/24
        image: binhex/arch-delugevpn:latest
        name: deluge
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8112
          name: port-8112
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: downloads
        - mountPath: /config
          name: deluge-config
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /config/openvpn/ && wget https://www.privateinternetaccess.com/openvpn/openvpn.zip
          && unzip openvpn.zip -o -d /config/openvpn/
        image: busybox:latest
        name: init-deluge
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: deluge-config
      nodeSelector: {}
      volumes:
      - name: downloads
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: downloads
      - name: deluge-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: deluge-config

---

  namespace: media

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: lidarr
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: lidarr
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: America/Denver
        image: linuxserver/lidarr:latest
        name: lidarr
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8686
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: lidarr-config
        - mountPath: /media
          name: media
        - mountPath: /data
          name: downloads
      nodeSelector: {}
      volumes:
      - name: lidarr-config
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: lidarr-config
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: media
      - name: downloads
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: downloads

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cloudcasa-io/Deployment/cloudcasa-kubeagent-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    component: cloudcasa-kubeagent-manager
  name: cloudcasa-kubeagent-manager
  namespace: cloudcasa-io
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudcasa-kubeagent-manager
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: cloudcasa-kubeagent-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/kubeagentmanager
        - --server_addr
        - agent.cloudcasa.io:443
        - --tls
        - "true"
        - --skip_tls_verification
        - "false"
        env:
        - name: MY_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: AMDS_CLUSTER_ID
          value: null
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ${clusterName,,}
              name: cluster-ids
        - name: KUBEMOVER_IMAGE
          value: catalogicsoftware/amds-kagent:3.1.0-prod.360
        - name: DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM
          value: yaml
        image: catalogicsoftware/amds-kagent:3.1.0-prod.360
        name: kubeagentmanager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /scratch
          name: scratch
      restartPolicy: Always
      serviceAccountName: cloudcasa-io
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: scratch

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/objectstorage-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: container-object-storage-interface-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: container-object-storage-interface
    app.kubernetes.io/version: main
  name: objectstorage-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: container-object-storage-interface-controller
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: container-object-storage-interface
      app.kubernetes.io/version: main
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: container-object-storage-interface-controller
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: container-object-storage-interface
        app.kubernetes.io/version: main
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --v=5
        image: gcr.io/k8s-staging-sig-storage/objectstorage-controller:v20221027-v0.1.1-8-g300019f
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: objectstorage-controller
      serviceAccountName: objectstorage-controller-sa

##### FILE: deployment5668.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to helloworld/Deployment/helloworld:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helloworld
  name: helloworld
  namespace: helloworld
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helloworld
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: souheilbenslama/flask_helloworld:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 100Mi
status: {}

---

##### FILE: deployment5676.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to database/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: database
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootpassword
              name: mysql-password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pv-claim

##### FILE: deployment568.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: 10.3.243.101
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /ifs/kubernetes
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /ifs/kubernetes
          server: 10.3.243.101

---

##### FILE: deployment5693.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/authentication:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
    service: authentication
    version: v1
  name: authentication
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
      service: authentication
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
      labels:
        app: api
        service: authentication
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LOCAL_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: postgres
        image: localhost:5050/authentication:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
        name: authentication
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
          name: http
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

---

##### FILE: deployment5694.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: postgres
        image: postgres:16
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-data
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-volume-claim

---

##### FILE: deployment5695.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/authentication-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: authentication-service
    service: authentication-service
    version: v1
  name: authentication-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: authentication-service
      service: authentication-service
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: authentication-service
        service: authentication-service
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['environment']
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        - name: SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['service']
        - name: LOCAL_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: authentication-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      serviceAccountName: authentication-service

---

##### FILE: deployment5696.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/authentication-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: authentication-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PGDATABASE
          value: authentication-service
        - name: PGPORT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: port
              name: postgres-cluster-superuser
              optional: false
        - name: PGHOST
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: postgres-cluster-superuser
              optional: false
        - name: PGUSER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: postgres-cluster-superuser
              optional: false
        - name: PGPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: postgres-cluster-superuser
              optional: false
        name: authentication-service

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: health-service
    service: health-service
    version: v1
  name: health-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: health-service
      service: health-service
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: health-service
        service: health-service
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['environment']
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        - name: SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['service']
        - name: LOCAL_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: health-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      serviceAccountName: health-service

kind: Deployment

  name: simple-bank-api-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: simple-bank-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: simple-bank-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_SOURCE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: postgres-url
              name: simplebank-config
        - name: REDIS_ADDRESS
          value: host.minikube.internal:6379
        image: bmigeri/simple-bank-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: simple-bank-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-server
        - containerPort: 9090
          name: grpc-server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/user-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: user-service
    service: user-service
    version: v1
  name: user-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: user-service
      service: user-service
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: user-service
        service: user-service
        sidecar.istio.io/inject: "true"
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CI
          value: "true"
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ENVIRONMENT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['environment']
        - name: VERSION
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['version']
        - name: SERVICE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['service']
        - name: LOCAL_POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: LOCAL_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: LOCAL_POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: user-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
      serviceAccountName: user-service

---

              key: password

          periodSeconds: 5

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

---

      - env:
        - name: REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL
          value: http://backend.amanpathakdevops.study/api/tasks

        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ecr-registry-secret

##### FILE: deployment5713.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment5724.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/ms-rrts-at-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-rrts-at-mysql
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-rrts-at-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-rrts-at-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-root-password
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-password
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: ms_auth
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-user
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysqladmin -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD ping
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: ms-rrts-at-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysql -h127.0.0.1 -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD -e'SELECT 1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-local-storage
          subPath: mysql
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/ms-rrts-at-postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-rrts-at-postgres
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-rrts-at-postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-rrts-at-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgresql-user
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgresql-password
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: ms_reviews
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - ms_admin
            - -d
            - ms_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: ms-rrts-at-postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres-port
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - ms_admin
            - -d
            - ms_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-local-storage
          subPath: postgres
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment5732_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/demo-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-app
  name: demo-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: demo-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT
          value: http://otel-collector.otel:4317
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_PROTOCOL
          value: grpc
        - name: OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_INSECURE
          value: "true"
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_EXPORTER
          value: otlp
        - name: OTEL_METRICS_EXPORTER
          value: none
        - name: OTEL_LOGS_EXPORTER
          value: none
        - name: OTEL_TRACES_SAMPLER
          value: always_on
        - name: OTEL_SERVICE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.labels['app']
        - name: JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS
          value: -javaagent:/shared/opentelemetry-javaagent.jar
        - name: logging_pattern_level
          value: '%!p(MISSING)refix(%!m(MISSING)dc{trace_id:-0}) %!p(MISSING)'
        - name: server_port
          value: "8080"
        - name: management_server_port
          value: "8081"
        - name: management_endpoints_web_basePath
          value: /actuator
        - name: management_endpoints_web_exposure_include
          value: info,health,prometheus
        - name: management_endpoint_health_probes_enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: management_endpoint_health_showDetails
          value: never
        - name: management_health_defaults_enabled
          value: "false"
        image: localhost:32000/demo-app:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: management
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: spring-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: management
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: management
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsUser: 1000
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 12
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: management
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: shared
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - |
          OTEL_VERSION=v1.27.0
          curl -fsSL https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-java-instrumentation/releases/download/$OTEL_VERSION/opentelemetry-javaagent.jar \
          -o /shared/opentelemetry-javaagent.jar
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: quay.io/curl/curl:8.2.1
        name: shared-volume
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: shared
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

            name: demo-app

        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: deployment5734.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <namespace-name>/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: <namespace-name>
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: storage.io/nfs
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: <ip_nfs_server>
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: <path_nfs_server>
        image: groundhog2k/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v3.2.0
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: <path_nfs_server>
          server: <ip_nfs_server>

---

##### FILE: deployment5736.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/the-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/pod-info-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest
        name: pod-info-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

---

##### FILE: deployment5747.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test1/Deployment/websrv-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: websrv
  name: websrv-deploy
  namespace: test1
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: websrv
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: websrv
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: httpd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            memory: 150Mi

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: rss-site
  namespace: default

  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: front-end
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

        ports:
        - containerPort: 88
